summary: Crazy fun bass cannons with dozens of song choices to terrorize Nazzem.
descriptionHtml:
I absolutely love the bass cannons created by [url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/Cordelephant]Cordelephant[/url] over at the steam workshop, although hitting the limit with my mods and never experimenting with the creation kit or anything, I had to start merging mods together.  This is the first mod I have altered/merged and I'm quite proud I was able to keep everything working fine =)

For those of you who are unaware of what the bass cannons are, they are ....staffs? that well... MAKE YOU WANT TO JAM AND TERRORIZE! they are one of the funnest mods I've ever used in skyrim, no not lore friendly, they are just for fun, and I assure you with these cannons you will have fun =)

[center][youtube]6apGNCWecqw[/youtube][/center]

For all of you who are familiar with the bass cannons, I have merged all of the cannons into one chest, renamed cannons 1-9 to include 0's in front of them (just for inventory purposes), and only included 1 book that has all of the cannons in it.

The chest can be found on the left side of Dragonsreach toward the back of the building (where it/they have always been)

Also While editing this mod I found a note that Cord included (although never saw in game) and i took the liberty of including the note into the book (just flip a couple pages past the last page)

I hope it's ok that I'm sharing this here and the original mod(s) can be found:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=184546806
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=312512515
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=195685303

Thanks to Cordelephant for creating these fun toys and if you guys like my merged mods, I for sure will have more to come (if it's even ok for me to) and ill probably enhance each mod i merge... in some way or another.
author: DrCustUmz
